logger.doc:name: Started request flow
logger.message: #["Logging initiated for the request to http://" ++ vars.request.host ++ vars.request.basepath ++ vars.request.path ++ " to get total hours"]

http:request.doc:name: Global Request
http:request.http:query-params: #[output application/json --- { "Date" : vars.request.Date default "", "fromDate" : vars.request.fromDate default "", "toDate" : vars.request.toDate default "" }]

logger.doc:name: completed request flow
logger.message: #["Logging completed for the request to http://" ++ vars.request.host ++ vars.request.basepath ++ vars.request.path ++ " to get total hours"]
